name: David Ramirez
text: Audio books aren't like listening to music. You can drive to it, but I think coding takes too much concentration to be paying attention to a story.

source_obj.text: Audio books aren't like listening to music. You can drive to it, but I think coding takes too much concentration to be paying attention to a story.

replies.text: Yeah, i don't think it'll work if you're coding. I mainly got it so my time in traffic can be somewhat productive.
